title: Building the Future of Developer Experience
description: Exploring how developer experience shapes the tools and platforms we use, and how we can build better experiences for developers in the headless ecosystem.

title: Headless Architecture Patterns for Scale
description: Deep dive into architectural patterns that enable headless systems to scale effectively while maintaining performance and developer productivity.

title: The Visual Revolution in Headless CMS
description: How visual editing capabilities are transforming the headless CMS landscape and enabling new workflows for content teams and developers.

title: Performance Optimization in Modern Web Apps
description: Hands-on workshop covering practical techniques for optimizing Core Web Vitals and overall performance in modern JavaScript applications.

title: From Monolith to Composable: A Migration Journey
description: Real-world case study of migrating from monolithic architecture to a composable, headless approach, including challenges and lessons learned.

title: Building Developer Communities in the Headless Era
description: Strategies for building and nurturing developer communities around headless technologies, with practical examples from the field.

title: GraphQL Federation in Production
description: Practical insights into implementing GraphQL federation in production environments, including monitoring, debugging, and team coordination.

title: The Future of Web Development: Trends and Predictions
description: Panel discussion exploring emerging trends in web development, from AI integration to new deployment models and developer tooling.

title: Micro-Frontends: Patterns and Anti-Patterns
description: Exploring successful patterns and common pitfalls in micro-frontend implementations, with practical examples and architectural guidance.

title: Accessibility in Modern JavaScript Frameworks
description: Comprehensive workshop on building accessible applications with modern JavaScript frameworks, covering ARIA, testing, and inclusive design principles.
